summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Martha Prizio and Lynda Lewis regarding a title examination for a property transaction involving Granite Realty LLC. The emails discuss the request for a full title examination and the timeline for completion, along with personal greetings and holiday wishes.

persons.name: Martha Prizio
persons.context: Martha Prizio is requesting a full title examination for a property transaction and is coordinating with Lynda Lewis and Theodore Prizio.

persons.name: Lynda Lewis
persons.context: Lynda Lewis is responding to Martha Prizio's request for a title examination and is preparing to start the work.

persons.name: Theodore Prizio
persons.context: Theodore Prizio is included in the email correspondence as a recipient and is involved in the title examination process.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is identified as the seller in the property transaction involving Granite Realty LLC.

connections.description: Martha Prizio is requesting legal services from Lynda Lewis for a title examination.
Martha Prizio and Theodore Prizio are both involved in the legal firm and are collaborating on the title examination.
Richard Yospin is the seller of the property being examined for Granite Realty LLC.

events.title: Title Examination Request
events.description: Martha Prizio requests a full title examination to be completed by the end of the day on November 26, 2019.

keyFacts: Martha Prizio is an attorney licensed in New Hampshire and Massachusetts.
The email correspondence discusses a title examination for a property at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH.
Granite Realty LLC is the buyer in the property transaction.
Richard Yospin is the seller and trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust.
The request for the title examination is time-sensitive, with a completion date requested for November 26, 2019.
